title: strange script font
content:
Hello,

Could anyone help me with the name of this font?  
Found it on the site of a Belgian Toy-dealer.

Need this!

Thanks a lot.

Kind regards,

N.

Font: 

 Simply Chalky 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317130555/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Schermafbeelding 2014-08-05 om 14.08.17.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317130555/http:/typophile.com/files/Schermafbeelding%202014-08-05%20om%2014.08.17.jpg) | 116.17 KB |
author: Niels B.

comments.content: "Wat? Hoe? ..." etc. is **[Simply Chalky](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317130555/http:/www.dafont.com/simplychalky.font?text=Wat%3F+Hoe%3F+Wanner%3F&back=author)** by Amy Louise Bandy [2012, Free for personal use]
The main text is **[FuturaHandwritten](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317130555/http:/www.dafont.com/futurahandwritten.font?text=Op+27+augustus.+Volgens+FUN+hangt)** free font by Billy Snyder [2013]
